name: tutorial_app_restful_api
description: node.js restful crud api with node.js, express and mongodb

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix tutorial_app_crud"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix tutorial_app_crud"

author: Tifa Fracica
